name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.
schedule:
Week 1 (2/26): Introduction to the course
Week 2 (3/5): Reviewing the common errors/defects in the 3 essays written in last semester 
Week 3 (3/12): Classification Essays: definition and organization
Week 4 (3/19): Classification Essays: exercises and students' topics
Week 5 (3/26): Classification Essays: exercises and students' outlines
Week 6 (4/2): National holiday
Week 7 (4/9): Extended Definition Essays: definition and organization
Week 8 (4/16): Extended Definition Essays: exercises and students' topics, first essays due
Week 9 (4/23): Extended Definition Essays: exercises and students' outlines
Week 10 (4/30): Midterm cafe time, discussion of the first essays
Week 11 (5/7): Reaction Essays: definition and organization
Week 12 (5/14): Reaction Essays: exercises and students' topics, second essays due
Week 13 (5/21): Reaction Essays: exercises and students' outlines
Week 14 (5/28): Review of common errors, problems of style
Week 15 (6/4):  Review of common errors, problems of style
Week 16 (6/11): Film viewing (to be decided)
Week 17 (6/18): Final review and exercises of the three modes
Week 18 (6/25): Final cafe time, discussion of the second essays
